thread.title: Three year old death investigation ongoing in Montgomery County -

author: News Release
title: Three year old death investigation ongoing in Montgomery County -
text:
Montgomery County, KS - Montgomery County Sheriff Robert Dierks reported on 10-15-2015 his office was contacted via 911 that a 3 year old boy was missing from the Jefferson area in Montgomery County.
Dierks advised his department along with Montgomery County Rural Fire, KS Highway Patrol, Montgomery County Jail and several local residents local residents immediately responded and a search was conducted for the missing child.
Dierks stated after a lengthy search, the body of the child was located on the property, Dierks declined to identify any names of the family involved in this terrible tragedy. "after a tragedy of this nature I believe the family deserves privacy and time to grieve." Dierks commented.
Sheriff Dierks appreciates the members of the community who came to help in the search and would like think each of them for their hard work and selflessness.
